00003 int MultiGrab::init(bool cacheTraining, char *avi_bg_path)
00004 {
00005 
00006         CvCapture *c;
00007         cams.clear();
00008         
00009         // if artvertiser is presented an argv of a background file (-b
00010         // /path/to/avi), accept it as a capture device.
00011 
00012         if (strlen(avi_bg_path) > 0)
00013         {
00014                 CvCapture *c = cvCaptureFromAVI(avi_bg_path);
00015                 cams.push_back(new Cam(c));
00016         }
00017         // else capture from the V4L2 device
00018         else 
00019         {
00020                 /*
00021                 while (1) {
00022                         CvCapture *c = cvCaptureFromCAM(cams.size());
00023                         if (!c) break;
00024                         cams.push_back(new Cam(c));
00025                 }
00026                 */
00027                 
00028                 CvCapture *c = cvCaptureFromCAM(1);
00029                 cams.push_back(new Cam(c));
00030         }
00031         if (cams.size()==0) return 0;
00032 
00033         if (!model.buildCached(cams.size(), cams[0]->cam, cacheTraining, cams[0]->detector)) {
00034                 cout << "model.buildCached() failed.\n";
00035                 return 0;
00036         }
00037         for (int i=1; i<cams.size(); ++i) {
00039                 cams[i]->detector.load("model.bmp.classifier");
00040                 std::cout << "blip" << std::endl;
00041         }
00042 
00043         return 1;
00044 }

00046 void MultiGrab::grabFrames()
00047 {
00048         for (vector<Cam *>::iterator it=cams.begin(); it!=cams.end(); ++it)
00049         {
00050                 cvGrabFrame((*it)->cam);
00051         }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void MultiGrab::allocLightCollector()
00055 {
00056         for (vector<Cam *>::iterator it=cams.begin(); it!=cams.end(); ++it)
00057                 (*it)->lc = new LightCollector(model.map.reflc);
00058 }

00060 void MultiGrab::Cam::setCam(CvCapture *c) {
00061         if (cam) cvReleaseCapture(&cam);
00062         if (c==0) return;
00063         cam = c;
00064         // avoid saturating the firewire bus
00065         cvSetCaptureProperty(cam, CV_CAP_PROP_FPS, 15);
00066         //cvSetCaptureProperty(cam, CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH, 1024);
00067         //cvSetCaptureProperty(cam, CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_HEIGHT, 768);
00068         cvSetCaptureProperty(cam, CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH, 800);
00069         cvSetCaptureProperty(cam, CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_HEIGHT, 450);
00070         IplImage *f = myQueryFrame(cam);
00071         assert(f != 0);
00072 
00073         // downsample the video to accelerate computation
00074         width = f->width; //cvRound(cvGetCaptureProperty(cam, CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH));
00075         height = f->height; //cvRound(cvGetCaptureProperty(cam, CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_HEIGHT));
00076         double fps = cvGetCaptureProperty(cam, CV_CAP_PROP_FPS);
00077         cout << "Camera " << width << "x" << height << " at " 
00078                 << fps << " fps, " << f->nChannels << " channels.\n";
00079 }
00080 
00081 MultiGrab::Cam::~Cam() {
00082         if (gray && gray != frame) cvReleaseImage(&gray);
00083         if (cam) cvReleaseCapture(&cam);
00084         if (lc) delete lc;
00085 }
00086 
00087 // this could be run in a separate thread
00088 bool MultiGrab::Cam::detect() 
00089 {
00090         IplImage *f = myRetrieveFrame(cam);
00091         if (f == 0) return false;
00092         if (frame == 0) frame = cvCloneImage(f);
00093         else cvCopy(f, frame);
00094 
00095         // convert it to gray levels, if required
00096         if (frame->nChannels >1) {
00097                 if( !gray ) 
00098                         gray = cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(frame), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1 );
00099                 // there's a big bottle-neck here, but only for video file capture!
00100                 cvCvtColor(frame, gray, CV_RGBA2GRAY);
00101                 //cout << "making gray" << endl;
00102         } else {
00103                 gray = frame;
00104         }
00105 
00106         // run the detector
00107         if (detector.detect(gray)) {
00108                 if (lc) lc->averageImage(frame, detector.H);
00109                 return true;
00110         }
00111         return false;
00112 }

00114 bool add_detected_homography(int n, planar_object_recognizer &detector, CamCalibration &calib)
00115 {
00116         static std::vector<CamCalibration::s_struct_points> pts;
00117         pts.clear();
00118 
00119         for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00120                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00121                         if (match->inlier) {
00122                                 pts.push_back(CamCalibration::s_struct_points(
00123                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00124                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00125                                         PyrImage::convCoordf((float)match->object_point->M[0], int(match->object_point->scale), 0),
00126                                         PyrImage::convCoordf((float)match->object_point->M[1], int(match->object_point->scale), 0)));
00127                         }
00128         }
00129 
00130         return calib.AddHomography(n, pts, detector.H);
00131 }
00132 
00133 bool add_detected_homography(int n, planar_object_recognizer &detector, CamAugmentation &a)
00134 {
00135         static std::vector<CamCalibration::s_struct_points> pts;
00136         pts.clear();
00137 
00138         for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00139                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00140                         if (match->inlier) {
00141                                 pts.push_back(CamCalibration::s_struct_points(
00142                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00143                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00144                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->object_point->M[0], int(match->object_point->scale), 0),
00145                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->object_point->M[1], int(match->object_point->scale), 0)));
00146                         }
00147         }
00148 
00149         a.AddHomography(pts, detector.H);
00150         return true;
00151 }
